body: My opinion is that the header also serves as documentation, so keeping it clean looks nicer to the front-end user. Additionally, it reduces compile time for downstream programs that include the header.
body_html: My opinion is that the header also serves as documentation, so keeping it clean looks nicer to the front-end user. Additionally, it reduces compile time for downstream programs that include the header.
